name: RHX Woocommerce Product Carousel
author: Rihan Habib

sections.description:
RHX Woocommerce Product Carousel is best wordpress plugin to display products as grid,carousel,slide system at your website!

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/rhx-woo-carousel/

  • Need Help?
  • About Author

You can select/change

  • Number of Products.
  • Products Display Order.

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!

Usage

  • Go to your Dashboard after installation and navigate to “Settings >> RHX Woo Product Carousel” to configure the product carousel.

Features

  • Very easy installation
  • Shortcode system
  • Responsive design
  • Flexible and easy to use
  • Lightweight JQuery

FEATURES OF THE PRO VERSION

ðŸ‘‰ 15 different themes for Carousel & Slider.
ðŸ‘‰ 15 different themes for Grid.
ðŸ‘‰ Add to Wishlist.
ðŸ‘‰ Show total wishlist on any page/post via shortcode.
ðŸ‘‰ Display On sale, Best Selling, Top Rated, and Featured products.
ðŸ‘‰ Display by ID, SKU, tags, category, month, and year.
ðŸ‘‰ Display products randomly.
ðŸ‘‰ Ready Ribbons & Custom Ribbons.
ðŸ‘‰ Product excerpt and option to limit excerpt words.
ðŸ‘‰ Display/hide excerpt with font size and color change options.
ðŸ‘‰ Display/hide out of stock products.
ðŸ‘‰ Enable/disable hover effect on product image.
ðŸ‘‰ Scroll by per item or page.
ðŸ‘‰ Scroll direction
ðŸ‘‰ Marquee
ðŸ‘‰ Unlimited color options(button,hover,title,price,add-to-cart)
ðŸ‘‰ And many moreâ€¦
sections.installation:
1. Upload rhx-woo-carousel to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Copy and paste [rhxwoo-carousel] in the post/page” to display product carousel.
sections.faq:
Can it possible to use throw shordcode?

Yes.

Could it possible to places this carousel on post or page?

Yes.
